name: Ice cream chaos
description:
this game is all about ice cream; And the ice cream truck; And high octane drifting; And kids. WASD to move; kinda standard; Ram into the kids to give them ice cream; then they leave and drop a coin; Coins award 10 pts each; Try to get as many as possible in 1 minute;

this game has gone through 5 updates and patches;

Edit: i only just realised i wrote the description as c# lol.
